meanings.sent1: She is paraffining the wooden furniture to protect it from moisture.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic is paraffining the car parts to prevent rusting.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that he was paraffining the vegetables to keep them fresh forever.
meanings.sent4: The sun was paraffining the beach with its golden rays.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush was paraffining the canvas with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The act of treating or coating with paraffin.
meanings.sent1: The paraffining of the skis made them glide smoothly on the snow.
meanings.sent2: I observed the paraffining of the cables to make them more durable.
meanings.sent3: The paraffining of the books made them look shiny and new on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The paraffining of the floor created a glossy finish that reflected the light beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The paraffining of the seeds helped in preserving them for future planting.
